summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ecommify Orders-Receipts integration. All features for order-to-receipt workflow working correctly: orders show receipt status badges, generate receipt from order dialog, bulk generate receipts, manual receipt creation with VAT calculation, PDF downloads. Backend: 100% pass rate (39/39 tests + order-receipt integration tests). Frontend: 100% success rate for all tested flows.
passed_tests: PIN login (2409) via numpad successfully authenticates
Navigation to Zamowienia (Orders) page via bottom nav
Orders tab shows orders list with receipt status badges
Green 'Paragon' badge shown for orders with receipts
Yellow 'Brak paragonu' badge shown for orders without receipts
Summary cards show total orders, value, and count without receipts
Shop filtering tabs (WSZYSTKIE, ecom1-4) work correctly
Month navigation (Luty 2026) works
Add order dialog opens with all fields (customer, email, phone, address, products, amount, date, payment)
Order creation with receipt_id=null (verified via toast and badge)
'Wystaw paragony (N)' bulk generate button appears when orders without receipts exist
Click on order opens detail dialog with customer info, items, receipt status
Generate receipt from order dialog via 'Wystaw paragon' button
Receipt linked to order after generation (green badge updates)
Switch to Paragony tab shows receipts list with amounts (Brutto, VAT, Netto)
Each receipt shows linked order badge if generated from order
Manual receipt creation via 'Wystaw' button dialog with VAT 23% auto-calculation
'Zestawienie PDF' (Summary PDF) download button available
Individual receipt PDF download buttons available
Delete order and receipt buttons functional
'Eksportuj do Excel' export button available
API: POST /api/orders creates order with receipt_id=null
API: POST /api/orders/{id}/generate-receipt creates receipt and links to order
API: POST /api/orders/generate-receipts-bulk generates receipts for all orders without one
API: GET /api/receipts/pdf/{id} returns valid PDF
API: GET /api/receipts/summary-pdf returns valid PDF
API: Duplicate receipt generation returns 400 'Paragon juz wystawiony'
All 39 backend API tests passing (auth, stats, CRUD, exports)
seed_data_creation: 3 test orders with receipts already exist in Feb 2026 (Piotr Wisniewski, Anna Nowak, Jan Kowalski)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Order-receipt integration fully functional. Test data exists: 3 orders in Feb 2026 with receipts (ecom1/ecom2 shops). Company settings are filled (CAMARI SPOLKA). Login uses numpad PIN 2409/2609/2509. App is entirely in Polish. Currency is PLN, VAT is 23%. Receipt numbering format: {sequence}/{month}/{year}/P. Shopify/TikTok sync endpoints are MOCKED (require real API keys).
